thread.title: Pep Boys Finds a Buyer in Bridgestone
thread.title_full: Pep Boys Finds a Buyer in Bridgestone - WSJ

author: Lisa Beilfuss
title: Pep Boys Finds a Buyer in Bridgestone
text:
Pep Boys—Manny, Moe & Jack agreed to be acquired by tire company Bridgestone Corp. for roughly $835 million in cash, about four months after the automotive parts and services retailer put itself on the block.
Tokyo-based Bridgestone will pay $15 a share for Philadelphia’s Pep Boys, a 23% premium over Friday’s close. The bid represents a 62% premium to where shares in Pep Boys traded before The Wall Street Journal reported that... To Read the Full Story, Subscribe or Sign In
